title: You’ll find little or no avalanche risk at these 4 backcountry ski touring spots
description: Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradual slopes on trails that serve as easy hikes in the summer.
content: Backcountry skiing means different things to different people. For some it means climbing hundreds of feet up beautiful peaks on pristine slopes in search of powder turns, which requires advanced ski… [+4972 chars]
de: An diesen 4 Backcountry-Skitourengebieten besteht kaum oder gar keine Lawinengefahr. Beim Backcountry-Skitourengehen geht es um deutlich flachere Hänge auf Wegen, die im Sommer als leichte Wanderungen dienen.
en: You’ll find little or no avalanche risk at these 4 backcountry ski touring spots. Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradual slopes on trails that serve as easy hikes in the summer.
la: Minimum aut nullum avalanche periculum invenies in his 4 scopis ski maculis variandis. Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradal slopes on calles that serve as easy hikes in summer.

title: RAI: Italy avalanche kills two Finns
description: Rescuers located the victims using tracking devices, but they were already dead.
content:
Two Finns, between the ages of 50 and 60, have died in an avalanche in northern Italy, according to Italian public broadcaster RAI.
The accident occurred on Thursday afternoon near the Solda ski res… [+482 chars]
de: RAI: Lawine in Italien tötet zwei Finnen. Retter lokalisierten die Opfer mithilfe von Ortungsgeräten, doch sie waren bereits tot.
en: RAI: Italy avalanche kills two Finns. Rescuers located the victims using tracking devices, but they were already dead.
la: RAI: Italia NIVIS CASUS duos Finnos necat. Salutores victimarum vestigandis machinas collocaverunt utentes, sed iam mortui erant.

title: Justine McCarthy: Melania Trump is the ultimate Stepford wife: silent, unseeing and uncaring
description: Melania, a documentary for which the nominal first lady was paid an obscene sum of €23.7m, demolishes any hope that under that big hat is a head swilling with profound thoughts
content: With impeccable choreography, the Melania movie was unleashed in cinemas on the same day as the release of the Epstein Files the Final Avalanche. The former showcases the ultimate Stepford wife for t… [+6469 chars]
de: Justine McCarthy: Melania Trump ist die ultimative Ehefrau von Stepford: schweigsam, unauffällig und gleichgültig. Melania, ein Dokumentarfilm, für den die nominelle First Lady eine obszöne Summe von 23,7 Millionen Euro erhielt, zerstört jede Hoffnung, dass unter diesem großen Hut ein Kopf voller tiefgründiger Gedanken steckt
en: Justine McCarthy: Melania Trump is the ultimate Stepford wife: silent, unseeing and uncaring. Melania, a documentary for which the nominal first lady was paid an obscene sum of €23.7m, demolishes any hope that under that big hat is a head swilling with profound thoughts
la: Justine McCarthy: Melania Trump est uxor ultima Stepford: tacita, invisibilis et otiosa. Melania, documentarium pro quo domina prima nominalis summa €23.7m obscoena soluta est, spem omnem labefactat sub illo pileolo magno caput in altum profundis cogitationibus elatum.

title: Europe’s deadly ski season: what’s driving the rise in avalanche deaths?
description: This season, at least 60 people have died in avalanches, including an Irishman in the Swiss Alps
content: On a sunny midweek morning last month, the risk of an avalanche across a broad swath of the Swiss Alps was judged to be considerable, according to a daily bulletin issued by the Swiss Institute for S… [+4741 chars]
de: Europas tödliche Skisaison: Was treibt den Anstieg der Lawinentoten an? In dieser Saison sind mindestens 60 Menschen bei Lawinen ums Leben gekommen, darunter ein Ire in den Schweizer Alpen
en: Europe’s deadly ski season: what’s driving the rise in avalanche deaths?. This season, at least 60 people have died in avalanches, including an Irishman in the Swiss Alps
la: Europa tempus letiferum ski: quid ortum in morte NIVIS?. Hoc tempore, saltem 60 homines in avalanches mortui sunt, etiam Hibernus in Alpibus Helvetiis
